name: TRS-80 Image
summary: Learn about .HR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Tandy produced TRS-80 computers from 1977 to 1981. To allow their computer to display HR images, TRS-80 users needed to install the Grafyx expansion card or another suitable hardware upgrade.

description: An HR file is a raster graphic created for use on a Tandy TRS-80 computer. It contains an image that is exactly 640 pixels wide by 240 pixels tall. Some modern image viewers can still open HR files.

instructions: You can open an HR file with XnViewMP (multiplatform), RECOIL (multiplatform), or Logipole Konvertor (Windows).
